SELECT post.* , board_name As post_board_name FROM post JOIN board ON board_id = post_board_num where post_title like concat('%', #{cri.search},'%') OR post_content like concat('%', #{cri.search},'%') ORDER BY post_id DESC LIMIT #{cri.pageStart}, #{cri.perPageNum}

SELECT post.*, board_name, SUM(CASE WHEN upvote = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as upvotes, SUM(CASE WHEN upvote = - 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as downvotes FROM post JOIN board ON post_board_num = board_id LEFT JOIN upvote ON post.post_id = upvote.post_id GROUP BY post_id ORDER BY post_id desc LIMIT #{cri.pageStart}, #{cri.perPageNum}
